SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CMSAds] ( [CMSAds_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CMSAds_PubblicaWEB] bit NULL DEFAULT ((0)), [Anagrafiche_Ky] int NULL , [Lingue_Ky] tinyint NULL , [CMSAds_Titolo] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSAds_Foto] varchar(300) NULL , [CMSAds_Url] varchar(500) NULL , [CMSAds_Roitracking] varchar(500) NULL , [CMSAds_Tags] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSAds_Categorie] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSAds_Province] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSAds_Zone] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSAds_UserInsert] int NULL , [CMSAds_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CMSAds_UserDelete] int NULL , [CMSAds_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CMSAds_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CMSAds_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [CMSAds_Provincie] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSAds_Click] int NULL DEFAULT ((0)) ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CMSAds] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CMSAds PRIMARY KEY ([CMSAds_Ky])
